title: Quinn rework
body: Hi, i realy like to Play Quinn{{champion:133}} , but her kit is realy weak and i think  riot could make her way stronger . What do you think? Should she become a rework like Ryze{{champion:13}} and Ashe{{champion:22}}? I`d like to hear your oppinion.

replies.body:
why do you like to play her if you think she is weak? also, if you like to play her, why would you want her to get a remake? it will probably change the way she is played now and she wont be fun for you anymore.

i think quinn is a really cool and strong champion and she doesnt have to be changed at all. shes really good where she is right now.
Ist realy hard to Play and win :(. But thats not the Problem. I think the potential of Quinn{{champion:133}} is much higher then they had use when they released her.

"Quinn is hard to play and win" shes easy to play and win with... With her Q and E she deals way more dmg if you know how to build her, had like 4 games in a row with her on ranked where in lategame we won cause i outplayed the enemy teams damage dealers with Q.

She isnt hard to play, you just have to know what you're doing.
most champs in league are hard to play
